title: Ornn update
body: So I haven't played LOL since the new champion (Ornn) came out because of the update. I don't have good internet but I can still play and do updates, for some reason this update keeps resetting when ever it looses internet connection. The update as of right now is 7596 MB, I got it down to 400 MB one or two nights ago but the internet company I go through had a surprise maintenance. When I got back on it was back up to the starting MBs. (around 7900+) This has happened to me two times now. Was the update that Ornn was in 7900 MB +? And doesn't the download leave off where it was? Idk I just want to get back to playing the game asap. If anyone has answers I would love to hear them. Then again it could just be me.

replies.body: If the update stops then your patcher will go back to rescan all of your game files for potential corruption, and then proceed with another update.  It's really important to make sure your connection is stable and in good health, so it doesn't keep cutting off like this.  Run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot that.
